thread.section_title: Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Location
thread.title_full: Excellent Location - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: charlesandrhona
title: Excellent Location
text:
First stay at this hotel while on business trip to London. Within walking distance of Kings Cross Station and conveniently situated for Angel Tube Station. Only 2 stops to Bank Tube Station. Hotel clean and tidy. Was allocated a room away from front of hotel and no noise problems. Staff welcoming and helpful. Lovely breakfast and very inviting dining room. Have already booked it for my next visit in 3 weeks time.
Room Tip: Ask for a room at the back away from traffic noise on Pentonville Road. See more room tips
